frame.name: Result_of_attempt_scenario
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> and their <fen>Action</fen> succeed or fail inasmuch as the result of an <fen>Action</fen> matches the <fen>Goal</fen> that they hope to bring about by the <fen>Action</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.</def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the means by which the <fen>Goal</fen> is achieved (or not).</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt succeeds or fails.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> is a phrase which describes the <fen>Agent</fen> during the <fen>Action</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The place where an attempt succeeds or fails..</def-root>

FE.name: Role
FE.definition: <def-root>A participant function in a particular event or in events of a particular kind.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is applied to expressions which indicate the prevailing physical conditions for the event, or some concurrent states of affairs.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root> The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the success or failure logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the success or failure, but not in all cases.</def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event or state of affairs that occurs or holds at a time that includes the time during which the success or failure reported by the target occurs and of which the success or failure is taken to be a part.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Action</fen> succeeds or fails.</def-root>
